## `ExportAll` {#batch-exportall}

Exports the project's results to the specified folder.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ExportAll(string outputFolder)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` outputFolder | The folder to save the project's results. |
:::
